update zx_sa_fs_settlement set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and zx_sa_fs_settlement_id in

mapper.select: SELECT sum(thisAmt) AS totalAmt , sum(thisAmtNoTax) AS totalAmtNoTax FROM zx_sa_fs_settlement where period <=#{period,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND zx_ct_fs_contract_id = #{zxCtFsContractId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and del_flag= '0' and apih5_flow_status='2'
select * from zx_sa_fs_settlement WHERE zx_ct_fs_contract_id= #{record.zxCtFsContractId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND period >#{record.period,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag= '0' and apih5_flow_status='2'

select initSerialNumber from zx_sa_fs_settlement where zx_ct_fs_contract_id=#{record.zxCtFsContractId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and del_flag= '0' and apih5_flow_status='2' order by initSerialNumber desc limit 1
